## Usage

### Loading

<skeleton-img loading></skeleton-img>

## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description | Type      | Default |
| --------- | --------- | ----------- | --------- | ------- |
| `block`   | `block`   |             | `boolean` | `false` |
| `height`  | `height`  |             | `number`  | `300`   |
| `icon`    | `icon`    |             | `boolean` | `false` |
| `loading` | `loading` |             | `boolean` | `false` |
| `width`   | `width`   |             | `number`  | `600`   |
